title: Domain 5.4: Given a scenario, troubleshoot video, projector, and display issues.
content:
🎯 5.4 – Troubleshooting Display Issues

🎯 Incorrect Data Source

Display shows “No Signal” or wrong input.

✅ Fix: Change source using remote or buttons (HDMI/VGA/DP).

🔌 Physical Cabling Issues

  • No signal
  • Flickering image
  • No audio

✅ Fix: Reseat or replace cables. Try known-good ones.

💡 Burned-Out Bulb

Projector runs but no image appears.

✅ Fix: Replace the lamp. Check usage hours in menu.

🖼️ Fuzzy Image

Blurred text/images from wrong resolution or dirty lens.

✅ Fix: Set resolution to native display. Clean lens.

🔥 Display Burn-In

Ghost images stuck on screen (common in older displays).

✅ Fix: Use pixel refresh tools or replace screen.

❌ Dead Pixels

Dots always off or stuck on.

✅ Fix: Usually not fixable. Replace screen under warranty.

⚡ Flashing Screen

  • Turns on/off rapidly
  • Caused by refresh rate or power issues

✅ Fix: Check cables, adjust refresh rate, verify power.

🎨 Incorrect Color Display

Colors look off or washed out.

✅ Fix: Reseat cables, reset color settings, test with new monitor.

🔇 Audio Issues

No sound via HDMI or distorted audio.

✅ Fix: Select correct playback device, update drivers, try new cable.

🌫️ Dim Image

Image too dark even on max brightness.

✅ Fix: Adjust settings, replace backlight or projector bulb.

💤 Intermittent Projector Shutdown

Projector powers off randomly.

  • Overheating
  • Dust buildup
  • Old bulb or PSU

✅ Fix: Clean filters, ensure airflow, check lamp and PSU.
